metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9290 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In FreeType before 2.6.1, a buffer over-read occurs in type1/t1parse.c onfunction T1_Get_Private_Dict where there is no check that the new values ofcur and limit are sensible before going to Again.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.8.1-2ubuntu2
libfreetype6 - 2.8.1-2ubuntu2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freetype package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.1-2ubuntu2').
